value.package.json:
{
  "name": "documents",
  "version": "1.2.0",
  "description": "PHPDocSpark documentation platform by Mark Hazleton",
  "main": "index.js",
  "engines": {
    "node": ">=18.0.0",
    "npm": ">=8.0.0"
  },
  "scripts": {
    "update-version": "node scripts/update-version.js",
    "dev": "vite build --watch",
    "dev:serve": "concurrently \"npm run dev\" \"npm run serve\"",
    "build": "node scripts/build.js",
    "build:prod": "NODE_ENV=production npm run build",
    "start": "npm run clean && npm run build && npm run serve",
    "serve": "php -S localhost:8001 -t website",
    "clean": "rimraf website/assets/css website/assets/js website/assets/images",
    "lint:js": "eslint src/**/*.js",
    "lint:css": "stylelint src/**/*.scss",
    "format": "prettier --write \"src/**/*.{js,scss,css}\"",
    "test": "echo \"Error: no test specified\" && exit 1",
    "prepare": "husky install || echo 'Husky not installed'"
  },
  "author": "Mark Hazleton",
  "license": "MIT",
  "dependencies": {
    "bootstrap": "^5.3.7",
    "bootstrap-icons": "^1.13.1",
    "chart.js": "^4.5.0",
    "datatables.net": "^2.3.2",
    "datatables.net-bs5": "^2.3.2",
    "datatables.net-buttons": "^3.2.4",
    "datatables.net-buttons-bs5": "^3.2.4",
    "datatables.net-responsive": "^3.0.5",
    "datatables.net-responsive-bs5": "^3.0.5",
    "jquery": "^3.7.1",
    "jszip": "^3.10.1",
    "prismjs": "^1.30.0"
  },
  "devDependencies": {
    "@eslint/js": "^9.33.0",
    "@types/node": "^24.2.1",
    "concurrently": "^9.2.0",
    "eslint": "^9.33.0",
    "eslint-config-prettier": "^10.1.8",
    "husky": "^9.1.7",
    "lint-staged": "^16.1.5",
    "postcss": "^8.5.6",
    "prettier": "^3.6.2",
    "rimraf": "^6.0.1",
    "sass": "^1.90.0",
    "stylelint": "^16.23.1",
    "stylelint-config-standard-scss": "^15.0.1",
    "terser": "^5.43.1",
    "vite": "^7.1.2"
  }
}
